ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Corpse Retrival and Pixie
ygData.msgSnippet: ... nice story, i had a similar situation in Dragon Necropolis the other day.  i was just following a group along before a Kland/Zland raid when things got
ygData.messageBody:
> Pretty cool encounter...

nice story, i had a similar situation in Dragon Necropolis the other day. i
was just following a group along before a Kland/Zland raid when things got
real hairy for about 30 straight minutes. those dragon constructs just look
to big to mes hehe.

> I would say without a doubt, the shamans's CHA buff (got me
> to 183 cha) made
> all the difference...

how would you really know unless you were in the same situation with say,
135 CHA? i've never really seen or heard of any indication that super high
cha has a significant effect on our mind-type songs. other than reports
like this, based on what you think is happening rather than concrete logs,
or like when a monk i was grouped with said that his 60 bard friend with 200
CHA had more resists on charm/mes than i did at 58 with 135 CHA. i don't
even have a set of CHA gear like many bards. with my normal gear, which is
max HP+AC, i have 138CHA and never have problems.

Shada
